website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully detailed ottoman that offers extra storage and seating.
pros: Faux leather with tufted top, nail head beads, and wooden feet lend an expensive air to this affordable piece
Durable enough to offer extra seating
cons: A few units split at the top seams after only a couple of months

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. I purchased the leather ottoman only four months ago, and the seams on the top have already split. It seems to be a sturdy product, but the quality of the upholstery leaves much to be desired. If you are determined to buy this product, I would suggest you try the cloth version. Maybe it will hold up, where the leather has failed. This was clearly a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: convenience concepts is a great company!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these ottomans which are absolutely wonderful! lots of storage room. after a couple months one of the ottomans seam started to come loose. I contacted convenience concepts and right away (I provided pictures) they stated that they would send a replacement asap! came within a week! I am so impressed by this company...this is the way companies used to do business...stand behind their products! it's very rare to have great customer service and a company that is proud of their products. thank you convenience concepts!
customer_reviews.author: kakaky

customer_reviews.title: Update: falling apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a foot rest for my broken La-Z-boy while I shopped for a new chair. It is very comfortable and I like how tall it is. It seems slightly taller than the average ottoman but that works great for me because I am 5’10” and tend to purchase taller furniture and this was a perfect match for my chair in color, height and comfort. Update: less than 3 months of use and the block the leg screws into fell off in an irreparable way. It was under light use - propping up feet, moving a few inches left or right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, well-built ottoman. I especially like that there's not a lot of give when sitting on it. Because this ottoman is located in a room where I have my grandchild's crib, I really like that when the lid is opened, it stays open firmly enough that you know it's not going to drop. No smashed little hands with that! It's also roomy and could hold 2-3 blankets. I have baby clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Estrada

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent! You can tell that it's been built with high quality materials. It's absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was drawn to the styling of this ottoman. I love the button tufts, nail head trim and turned feet. It is faux leather, but very pretty and very well made. It has plenty of space in the storage area for multiple throw blankets, pillows, books, DVDs, or whatever. It's very comfy to prop your legs and feet on. I have a recliner that I normally use, but have been sitting in my new accent chair more recently, just so I can use this ottoman:). Note: the nail head trim is brass, not silver as it looks in some product images.
customer_reviews.author: dguzi

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Nice ottoman with storage. I removed the feet because I wanted it to sit a little lower. Great color, very stylish. Worked great for my space.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Save your money , Buy a better made foot stool.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a large seam with no stitching on the center of the top. Emailed Convenience Concepts, no answer so far. 8 days.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J Coront

customer_reviews.title: Attention not paid to detail
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice from a distance but once you get closer you start to see there was not much attention paid to detail. My biggest issue is the lid is not lined up with the bottom of the ottoman. This is why I'm sending it back. I would have been ok with the buttons being crooked and not lining up but since I was taking pictures anyway I added that as well. I didn't even get the feet out since I decided to send it back as soon as I saw the lid. The lid does hold up nice, the inside looks spacious, and the fabric is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: mommaof3

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well-made and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the seat, nice and thick but not too soft, providing great comfort and excellent support at the same time. In fact, originally I bought this for my guest room for use as a dressing seat, which also served as storage for an extra blanket or two. Then I realized I actually had more space in that room for a larger ottoman of the exact same model (, so wasted no time in ordering that one, too. I then moved this one into my own bedroom, where I'm enjoying it thoroughly. The proverbial win-win!
customer_reviews.author: ecc.sd

customer_reviews.title: Stitching split at seams
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for just a little over two months. We bought a pair to go in my home office. As another poster has mentioned, one of the seams on top has now split. The product looks nice and the storage is handy but we will now have to replace both pieces. This room doesn't see much use so I am extremely disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Erran Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased they grey color. The color is darker than expected and it has a nice woven appearance. Very rich looking and the black legs really add to the appearance. It has a nice interior and hinge. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mags514

customer_reviews.title: Material doesn't wear well after 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: We use this item daily when sitting on the couch as a leg rest. It's great for storage and it looks great with our furniture, even the legs match. But we've noticed that with regular use the fabric isn't holding up but still intact. No tears or holes, just feels rough. A few of the buttons on top have popped loose. We did expect to see wear but not this soon and to this extent
customer_reviews.author: 08kape

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So after reading mixed reviews I bought one of these..I thought worse case I could always return it. So here goes: "yes"...it has a really cheap inside fabric that tears easily. NO it does not effect any function I simply used a staple gun and reattached it, however if the tear was large enough I would of just removed the fabric liner. So not only would I recommend but I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: BLACKDOG

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy!  Awful smell in fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I must add to the review below. I am very disappointed to find that the footstool has a terrible odor in the fabric. This wasn’t immediately noticeable but after approximately an hour it had filled my family room and surrounding areas a strong smell. Being extremely sensitive to odors I actually had an attack of asthma within the hour after finishing getting it all together. At that time I didn’t think about the stool, but the odor finally became so strong that I have had to put the footstool outside on the porch. The smell seems to be in the fabric and there seems to be no way of getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is great! I needed a smaller foot rest/storage for my formal living room and this is perfect. I ordered the gray color and I feel it is slightly different from the picture, but it still looks great. I love the fabric and the beading design on the bottom. The quality of this is very good and such a steal at this price! The storage area is pretty big too, you'll be able to fit a lot of blankets too. All you need to do to put it together is install the legs, it was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: melissa8076

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. But, the poor construction bit me just like many others have stated in the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this ottoman. But, the poor construction bit me just like many others have stated in the reviews. A couple days after delivery, & me daring to put my feet up on this ottoman....the buttons were all coming loose or hanging by a single thread. On top of that imperfection, the top of the ottoman might as well have been made of brick. It was very uncomfortable and hard. Cool concept, poor execution. Returned via Prime membership days after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: dwillis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged, I notified them provided them with my Amazon order number. The top came with two deep cut in strap marks,one side cut into the fabric, the hinge was defective my husband had to remove it to prevent me from getting hurt. Screw came out of bracket and could not be tightened making the bracket unreliable . I paid $90.99 for this...waste of money. I have not heard from them to resolve this matter. It has been a couple weeks now no word from them .
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Oldak

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy faux leather ottomans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ottoman on 10/18/2015, (2 yrs & 5 months ago). The top began splitting at the seams about 6 months ago, and the stuffing was coming out of the splits. I had to throw it out and buy another ottoman, so I only got a couple of years use out of it. I will not buy another faux leather ottoman because the 2nd one I got is also coming apart, and I've only had this one for about 6 weeks or so. Very disappointed in both these products!
customer_reviews.author: The Sharp Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Item looks good but one corner is caved in
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken. Wooden frame broke through inner lining. Item looks good but one corner is caved in.
customer_reviews.author: jj3411

customer_reviews.title: Looks lovely and is sturdy and classy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ottoman. My fiancé always gets irritated if I put my feet up on our coffee table, so I solved the problem with this! It matches our gray couches and looks really classy and even my fiancé loves it. We've received lots of compliments on it, and I love that it has storage (we keep blankets in it). It's strong enough for someone to sit on if you need extra seating while entertaining. And as a bonus, when you open it and let the top go, it closes very slowly (doesn't slam shut). So no risk of pinching fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say thanks to Amazon. You have made my life much easier because you have pretty much have everything I need when I needed it without having to go to store to store looking for it when it's right on Amazon. Okay I want to say I love my Green Velvet Ottoman. I have it in my living room for extra seating and storage. The quality is excellent and it's nice and firm. All I had to do was pull it out of the box and screw the 4 legs on. I'm very impressed and satisfied. It arrived on the day it was promised. Thank Again. A. May
customer_reviews.author: anquanetta may

customer_reviews.title: Perfect instead of a chair
customer_reviews.text: This comfort storage was bought for my new basement bathroom. It is sooo perfect instead of a chair I was going to buy. The color is amazing, and very rich looking (wow). I'm using it for towels and a place for guest to sit while getting dressed. It is very well made, and only took a couple of minutes to screw on the legs. This was a awesome choice,and lucky for me caught it on sale, I love it even more! (smile) This was such as nice feature for my bathroom, I had to buy a second one for my family room - (so, that's was missing all along)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, doubles beautifully as dog stairs!
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, my primary purpose for this item was to help my dog(low to the ground Carin Terrior) safely get from the floor to my bed. Item looked beautiful and sturdy in picture and the realty did not dissappoint! Actually LOVE this ottoman, has decent storage for smaller items. Dog stairs are poor quality, not at all sturdy, and usually ugly. This Ottoman looks beautiful in my bedroom and the cat and dog both easily use this without any worry on my part it will tip or slip. LOVE IT. Dog approved, cat thinks it's hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Michelerp

customer_reviews.title: Beware of white dots!
customer_reviews.text: I would be able to give this a 5 star rating but I can’t since it has a major problem. This ottoman has white particles that are coming out from under the cloth cover and are on top of the ottoman each time I look at it, I sweep them off and next time I see it ,there they are again! As best I can tell maybe the padding is breaking down or got too hot and definitely is desentigrating. If this was not happening then I would have given a 5 star rating because it is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Go By Air

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking ottoman, but be aware the color you order may not be as shown......
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman looks to be well made, but just received them and only time will tell how sturdy and how long they hold up. I was VERY disappointed in the color. We ordered dark espresso believing it would be a very dark brown as pictured, but what I received is reddish brown with medium brown legs. If I had known the reddish brown color was dark espresso, I would have ordered black. Will keep it rather than going through the hassle of trying to return them, but am very disappointed in the color.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and sturdiness of this piece. It arrived well packaged and assembly couldn't have been more simple...just screw on the legs. The top is not a soft cushion more firm really but it's beautiful and STURDY. Can absolutely be used as additional seating in a pinch. Storage is good size, I store throw pillows inside, about 3 fit well without squeezing, 4 if you pack it in. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Server

customer_reviews.title: Would definately purchase this again!!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, stylish, & functional!! I love how the hinges stay locked when you lift the lid up!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Earle

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It's pretty and it's sturdy. It's light enough to move easily. I put felt pads on the legs and it slides well on hardwood. I pressed on the top to check the strength of the stitching (per other reviews) and can see where heavy use could cause seams to stretch apart. This isn't a problem for my purpose, as I use it for a puppy step-up, and keep it covered with a pad. I wouldn't advise it to be used as a gaming seat for this reason. As an ottoman or decorative storage, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Substantial, quality, beauty, comfort. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This footstool has it all; it’s substantial, heavy, made with quality materials, beautiful, and comfortable. And you have storage space inside as an added bonus. I’ve bought so many pieces of junk, that looked good on websites, but turned out to be anywhere from pathetic to barely passable, but this item is superb and worth every penny I spent on it. I don’t know where it was made, but it doesn’t appear to be Chinese junk like most everything sold today. This is “quality” for your hard earned money!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy and OliverTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cute ottoman for a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman will do the trick, but it is smaller so be sure to check the measurements before you purchase. Can fit a few throw blankets in the amount of storage space available. A few of the nail head trim pieces are not quite aligned with others, but not really noticeable unless you are looking for that type of imperfection. It was easy to assemble, and looks nice for the price. So far so good, but it has been less than 24 hours so we shall see! Packaged well, and not too heavy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: susan dancause

customer_reviews.title: Defective furniture + No support from seller
customer_reviews.text: This ottomon comes in two basic pieces. The ottomon and a set of 4 screw in legs. 3 of the 4 holes were the right size and I could screw the legs in. However one of the hole was too big (incorrect parts during manufacturing). As a result, the leg couldn't be screwed in and falls right out. I would have been willing to work with the seller to rectify this but since I got no response, I'm giving it a default 1 star to caution other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Edih

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a "reading nook" with an old, leather chair that I love to snuggle into, that needed something on which I could put my feet up. This leather-look ottoman is perfect! It's a good-enough match to the (very distressed) leather chair, and its storage space is an added bonus. All I had to do was screw on the four little legs and it was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman is falling apart after only a few months.
customer_reviews.text: The seams on the top of this ottoman are coming apart. This item was purchased in February 2018 and does not get hard use. It is owned by a couple of retirees. We use it mainly to store throws and some small pillows. I really like the looks of it, but the quality is not very good. Our request to return the item was refused since it had been longer than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman, it's the perfect size for my space and it provides the extra storage and seating I need. Well made and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: C White

customer_reviews.title: good stool for little money
customer_reviews.text: Looks more expensive than it really is. If you feel underneath the lining on the inside, there doesn't seem to be much frame. If it's in an environment that's going to give out a lot of abuse like ours will, then you might want to install brackets on the inside corners to stabilize it a little more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman with Quirks
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman came in a very nice brown faux leather color. The ottoman was very easy to assembly with just 4 legs needed to be screwed into the bottom. It came well packaged, without any damage to the ottoman during shipping. Overall it’s held up relatively well, but only time will tell. I will say I am fairly skeptical on longitivtiy of the product, as the buttons on top seem to be shifting with use and look like they may pop off (they have not yet). The opening mechanism is also not the most well built - so be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: drew Miller

customer_reviews.title: the color was accurate.
customer_reviews.text: this product met my expectations. its a nice velour kind of fabric. the top is tufted and there are brass nails around the bottom,which look quite nice. the storage area is ample. i have not put on the legs, because it is the correct height without the legs. it looks just fine without the legs. the legs are in the storage compartment and are properly packaged. my friends also like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted....sending back.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to get what I did not order. The the feet for the ottoman are wrong. I rather not wait on the seller to get it right. The ottoman sits about 14in high...meaning the feet will have to be kind of large to add the extra 4 inches to the "18 in height" ottoman. The gold buttons are too spaced out as well. I am bot satified. Yes the ottoman is beautiful, but I did not want some variation. I wanted what I ordered. So much for Convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Nice little piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Not too big. VERY easy to put together - just screw in the feet. The only bad thing was I didn't notice the writing on the top of the box which says "DON'T CUT HERE! OPEN FROM THE BOTTOM!" I fortunately didn't cut the furniture. Nice bit of storage inside. The brown "leather look" is fairly shiny, but it looks nice with the button detail on the top and the metal button look around the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! This fits perfectly in the corner of my bedroom. It's looks so rich and well made and the feet really add an elegant touch. It stores just enough.... I have a large blanket in there (could fit two) but I also have a couple medium sized throw pillows in there. Another great feature is the controlled close lid... it doesn't slam shut. Love this piece! So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: vegas

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very misleading for the espresso color I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very misleading for the espresso color I ordered this 2 times both times I got a very dark color looks black to me not even close to brown I returned both of them will not get another one
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Impressed! Picture is true to life, I was surprised!! This ottoman is very nicely made, material is soft but durable feeling and there are no odors coming from it. The storage inside is perfect for our 2 snuggle blankets and little wastebasket in our motorhome which is perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy o

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY pleased with this Ottoman! The Fabric, Style & Over-All Appearance is Very Nice! I looked for one similar at a High Quality Furniture Store & they were selling for $400-600!! I'm Very Happy with this Product! Shipping was quick & assembly was easy, requiring me to just screw 4 little legs on, with no tools needed! It took 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this footstool as husband homesteads the one that came with our Costco leather furniture. Just the right size matches my furniture pretty well without being all matchy-matchy. Using storage area to hold my electric blanket throws. Not expensive, not expecting it to last forever. We are pretty easy on our furniture so this was a good, inexpensive item for us.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: High quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt a very beautiful ottoman! From the thick, tufted top to the nailhead trim, this ottoman is stunning. The color of the leather is a pretty dark brown but it's not too dark where it would be similar to coffee. Last, but definitely not least, are the legs which are very nice as well. Instead of the standard square or pyramid style legs this piece comes with round, espresso-colored wood legs which give it a nice touch. For the price this ottoman is beautiful and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Updated review :(
customer_reviews.text: ***update*** within 6 months ottoman looks like seams are pulling apart. We only put our feet on it occasionally. No reason it should be looking so worn. Disappointed. Nice ottoman. Perfect for my space. The color is more tan but works with my cream and brown chair. The tufting is tight. Seems sturdy to sit on and storage space is added bonus. Nail head trim is nice and wooden legs add nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Millertime

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bunch of lint rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Beautiful burgundy color. Comfortable. Large storage capacity. Looks great. Fyi it collects lint and pet hair like nobody's business. Within hours of opening the box, I was alarmed to see the thing covered im white fuzzies etc. Buy a case of lint rollers is you buy this hassock. (Or do like your grandma and get a clear plastic cover for it.)
customer_reviews.author: HighMileageFeets

customer_reviews.title: Love this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman! The blue isn't the exact shade I expected (I thought it would be a true navy but I feel like it's a little lighter and more green), but it's still a beautiful color and matches my living room well. I honestly don't use the storage, I just needed a spot to prop my feet up. The ottoman did require assembling the legs, but that was easy, and it was assembled within just a minute of opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ottoman! Ordered the Charcoal gray. There is an issue with the pegs not being even as one of them is missing a bottom knob but wrote the seller hoping to receive a replacement for it to be able to use the pegs. Other than that it is a very nice ottoman and very well put together. Even receive it a lot earlier than expected. Added photo of bottom pegs. Luckily can use without them :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: As good as any I looked at in furniture stores.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Not at all cheap looking and matches other furniture very well.
customer_reviews.author: evonne

customer_reviews.title: Solid ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice. It was a little high for my chair with the legs so I just unscrewed them and store them inside. So easy. Color is surprisingly pretty as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cam C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, treasure chest
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting and needing this for a long time, I like the size of this one, most that I looked at, would been too big for the space I have to put it. I was very happy with how nice it looks, I got the dark espresso, a nice brown color, goes good with my furniture. I have all my remote controls sitting on it, dare I say I did put my feet on it once, but they were socked. The storage space is a nice size, I have some clothes in there, sometimes I think of it as a little treasure chest. 8)
customer_reviews.author: Wm Simpson

customer_reviews.title: The kids just can't break this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman has stood up to over three years of three kids jumping all over it like crazed monkeys. The seams started to pull early on just a bit and I thought it wouldn't last. It never got any worse and still looks pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Mama P

customer_reviews.title: Dunno why legs were even included-
customer_reviews.text: The legs for this ottoman just won't screw in to be a secure bottom, it makes me doubt that it will last any amount of time, especially as a foot rest or seat. The storage space is a good amount, and it looks fairly nice. Probably wouldn't buy again for the time I spent trying to screw in the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking and lid operation perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This really looks great in our master bath. It is of a height that is very comfortable for senior citizens. It is also well padded. It has plenty of room for anything you wish to store or as in our case a laundry hamper. The lid operation is very smooth and it stays up until you're ready to close it. I looked a long time to find one that was attractive and met all my needs this one was definitely the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Potter

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, nicely made, fabric is perfect, great extra storage! Sometimes I sit on it to put on my socks and shoes and the top is hard - not cushioned like I thought it would be - otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jfpendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small, portable, cushioned and attractive bench for my bedroom. This is perfect. I love everything about it and appreciate the good quality. I don't need it for storage, though it will be a good hiding spot for Christmas presents! It is a bit bulky to move around as freely as I had imagined, but it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Well made but be careful of color description.
customer_reviews.text: I would have kept this ottoman. It was nicely constructed. The "tan" color however is more pink than tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Storage and functional
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way for my chihuahua to get up on my bed because the little stairs they sell frightened her. This works great and I love the storage compartment inside. LOL got it for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Well made and designed. Material is high quality, and the fabric is extremely comfortable and soft. The plush top is great for either a foot stool or a simple seat in a pinch. Storage wise, it provides a surprising amount of space and the latch locks to stay open which is convenient and safe if used by children. Extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: the product is sturdy. all you have to do is put the feet on. I think it is very well made and looks like it is a very expensive item..the color is beautiful... the material is really a good quality.. and I love the tacks all around the bottom..
customer_reviews.author: laurie decker

customer_reviews.title: I love the bronze gold nail heads and the storage space
customer_reviews.text: Has more of a tweed look than linen. It has Brown tones in the tweed. The cushion on top is hard, but not an issue for me. I love the bronze gold nail heads and the storage space. Just wish it matched my other linen items.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn723

customer_reviews.title: Doubles perfectly as extra seating and added storage
customer_reviews.text: After the holidays, I vowed to figure out how to add seating to our crowded, small living space. I finally came up with the idea of storage ottomans and found 2 of these. They are perfect in height for sitting or to use as an ottoman and, also have a good deal of storage space under the hinged, well-built lids. I couldn't be more pleased!!! Additionally, they each came wrapped and boxed securely and arrived in a timely fashion!!
customer_reviews.author: LYNDON EFFINGER

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT TO PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: The storage ottoman worked out great for me. My living room is small, so it's just the right size I was wanting. The dark espresso color matched my living room furniture very well. The ottoman legs was the only thing to assemble so it made it easy. When I open the top lid of my ottoman there is storage space to store a few small throws for my two Yorkies. One of my Yorkies, Ruby, loves to jump up on the ottoman to watch for the cats or deer outside. So Ruby and I gave this product 5 stars. Ruff Ruff
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Buttons on top coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Product came and the leather has a bit more sheen to it than I anticipated but that was fine. It was consistent with description. Storage/hinge is fine. Size is as stated. Only problem is we have had it for 3months and two of the buttons on top are losing their "leather" coating. It's just unwrapping unfortunately and we are outside of the return window. I think I would have preferred the gray velvet one anyway. But we are definitely going to have to buy a different ottoman in the future. Those buttons will drive me crazy eventually :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stool, it looked like it would not sustain wear and tear but I have had it for a while and it is great, looks just as beautiful as when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Dornsy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ottoman. It only took 2 days to arrive and the value compared to regular furniture stores is outstanding. I like the storage for my sofa blanket too!
customer_reviews.author: Dlangmeyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a hard 5 Star to get
customer_reviews.text: We just received 2 of these ottomans, and from what I can see, they are beautiful made, although the interior looks a little cheap. They seem to be sturdy, but not designed for rough and tumble like with kids. They look great, and have a classic look to them. We'll see how they fare. Honestly, I cannot tell if these are real or imitation leather.
customer_reviews.author: Maui wowie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: this ottoman is sturdy, attractive and well built. I was having trouble getting out of my recliner. I purchased the ottoman as an alternative. I feel liberated, at being able to get up easily. I enjoy the advantage I have of additional storage place.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred E. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality and size of this hassock. I’ve had it for almost a year and it still looks brand new. The top stays up when opened, safe for children
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the room, plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: A little higher than I thought it would be, which isn't a big deal unless you have a low couch. Plenty of storage space and very sturdy. Love the color. Pictures are close to true, maybe a touch darker in the photo. I love this piece! it's exactly what I needed for storage. Sturdy enough that it can also be extra seating in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for my bedroom, place to lay my clothes in the morning or when I get home and there is tons of space inside. I keep all my jeans in there, over 10 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect recliner height
customer_reviews.text: Love It! It matches very closely to my several year old recliner. Needed a foot stool because I don't have the strength to push the foot rest down anymore. It's the perfect height. It glides easily on wood floors. My cats love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love my new stool.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this foot stool. It is much better than I thought it would be. It is very nice and I keep it by my bed . It good to put pillows on . You can set on it or use it like a table.I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Item showed up on time and well packed. I really like that the hinge holds the top up so fingers can’t get pinched. The storage is exactly what you’d expect for the dimensions given - adequate for a blanket/throw or for storing small electronics or your latest knitting project. I left the feet off and put furniture slides underneath which works better for the height of the chair I have it by. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these ottomans. It is just my husband and I. And after one year.... both are split. One on the top, the other on the side. Very poor quality material. They look nice. Very sturdy. Perfect size. But fall apart with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Krupiak

customer_reviews.title: Great storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: It holds a lot of yarn and most important, did not stink inside like a cheaper one I bought a few years ago. It is also very comfortable and has quality fabric
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Rast

customer_reviews.title: The sturdiness of the lid for the storage area.
customer_reviews.text: I did a few shopping trips to try to locate an ottoman that met all my needs and this one was the one. The look is very pretty and the storage space is immense and I like that the lid has reinforced hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Samoze knows

customer_reviews.title: Looks attractive and not shoddy
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the color as I was trying to match another piece of similar materials. Not the fault of the company or quality...Just a slightly different color of white than I was looking for. It's well made, sturdy and will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: back yard farmer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I got the wine colored one, it is perfect for what we needed, just the right size and the shipping was super fast. I’ve been using it with my chair I purchased at World market and it’s perfect! We don’t have a lot of space, but this really highlights the room!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: The  Seams are too small.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the fact that it opens for storage. I like the beading around the bottom and I like the legs. Big problem is the Stitching on the seams have less than a quarter of an inch.so the Seams pull apart easily. Also, it’s hard as a rock! So that makes it uncomfortable to put your feet up
customer_reviews.author: double L

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid foot stool for the money. The only problem was that the lid was mounted slightly off center, and the color was more black than the dark brown pictured. Otherwise I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bard

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase because of the reviews but glad i did. Looks better in person, I've had this for a couple of weeks and it looks great and seat is still firm. I use this everyday as my vanity bench. Has a lot of room for storage; I use it for all my hair tools and there's plenty of room to spare. Overall a good purchase I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: annie rod

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous piece of furniture for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture was pretty cheap, so I wasn’t sure what to expect. I absolutely love it, and nobody believes what I paid for it or that I bought it online without seeing it in person first! It looks great with my black and cream colored chair, and I love the rivets at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: miriam c.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice material and looks nice but would have looked nicer with brass nail-heads
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to have brass nail-heads around the bottom and my ottoman did not so that is why I gave 4 stars. Otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Ivory is actually bright white.
customer_reviews.text: Ivory is bright white. Nice quality for the price. Good height. Good storage. Ottoman came with rips inside. I contacted the company and they replaced the item right away. I would recommend this company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LDT

customer_reviews.title: Built nicely but upholstery material is inexpensive looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy piece, like the storage area too. It is built very well but the upholstery material looks very inexpensive. It does the job very well for us, it is a sitting spot for our dog!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: screws stripped
customer_reviews.text: we've had this for just over a month and the wholes that hold the mechanical part that holds the top open come out repeatedly. which means that i'll have to be make new wholes or pay someone to figure out how to repair it. very sad that it is out of the return window or i would try to exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: I really like the material and looks of this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material and looks of this ottoman. Placed the order twice and kept getting the wrong color. Sure would have like to have gotten the right one. That's why I rated it a four instead of a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: WOW, Super nice and very pleased with all, shipping and Amazon employees too!
customer_reviews.text: I really did not know the size, but could see the quality! Really, I was holding my breath until they arrived a day early and I opened one of the boxes. 24" X 19" and beautiful storage space too.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value. If you don’t mind part are falling off
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I came back to add to this review that pars are starting to come undone , so be careful It come completely assembled , aside from few things that you have to put together
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue ottoman and the color matches item online. Ottoman is just the right size, looks stately with nailhead trim and tufted upholstered top, is lightweight, and comes with a large storage area. Only assembly is screwing in four legs (found legs inside storage area). As mentioned by other reviewers, the ottoman appears to be well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DMC 419

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Shoddy
customer_reviews.text: How did this rate 4 1/2 stars. This is shoddy. The hinge came loose the 1st time I opened it. Cheap cloth interior lining. I bought this for toy storage so it will only be used a couple of times a month so it will do But I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: laurie boyles

customer_reviews.title: button popped off
customer_reviews.text: One of the top buttons popped off today after normal use (laying legs on it). I like the ottoman, but if I hadn't been able to push the button back in then it would have become an ugly, useless piece.
customer_reviews.author: Andante

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, nice color
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. Perfect piece for my mom’s small living room. Can fit a few blankets in it and it’s a beautiful navy blue color. Feels sturdy! The nails are silver though. Not sure you can see that in the picture
customer_reviews.author: CLS&LMS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful ottoman. Very nice quality and smaller size fits well in my apartment-sized living room. Has even more storage space than I thought. I have pillows and a blanket inside with no problem. Love the nail-head design and tufted top. Feels and looks like real leather. It's really very lovely and sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Affordable Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is exactly what I was looking for as a simple, yet elegant addition to my living room. The color is beautiful, and it even has wooden legs that you screw on the bottom (they are so easy to screw on that even I was able to put them on, and I am notoriously awful at assembling anything). I highly recommend this product if you are looking for something that looks super nice and expensive but is incredibly affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort when using and great looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, great storage and feels great when using it!!️
customer_reviews.author: Robert Feaster

customer_reviews.title: It arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this ottoman. It is well made and sturdy. It can fit a huge throw blanket with room to spare.I only had the put on the feet. It's excellent!
customer_reviews.author: D

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Designs4Comfort Storage Ottoman, Dark Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:Dark EspressoDesigns4comfort 5th avenue storage ottoman by convenience concepts this elegant ottoman is accented with beautiful nail head beaded trim along the bottom. also features button tufting on top of the extra padded hinged lid and attractive turned solid wood-Feet.
feature_bullets: Triples as a Footrest, Chair and Storage Unit
Button Tufting, Hinged Lid and Nailhead Trim
Convenient hinged lid stays up while placing items in storage area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,311 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
